benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/admin/invoices - Trigger an invoice generation for all parked accounts

covered: Valid POST request scenarios: 200 responses with default parameters, pagination (offset/limit), and header variations (required and optional headers).
Empty response handling: no parked accounts results in 200 with no invoices generated (TC04).
Pagination and query parameters coverage: offset/limit, max limit, extra query parameters (TC02, TC10, TC11, TC13).
Large payloads / high data volume: tests with 1000 and 10,000 parked accounts (TC10, TC12).
Error handling / authorization: missing required header (TC05), invalid values (TC06/TC07), unauthorized (TC08), service unavailability (TC09).
Recovery / idempotency: retry scenarios ensuring no duplicates (TC15).
Regression tests: header parsing correctness (TC16) and backward compatibility with older clients (TC17).
Performance under concurrency: concurrent requests and per-account single-generation guarantee (TC18).
Edge-case coverage: extra params (TC11), partial input (TC13), and maximum limit (TC10) scenarios.
gaps: Rate limiting / throttling tests are not explicitly covered.
Caching behavior testing (ETag / Cache-Control) is not covered.
Invalid or malformed JSON body / Content-Type handling tests are not explicitly covered.
recommendations: Add rate limiting/throttling tests to verify behavior under bursty traffic.
Add tests for caching headers and caching behavior (ETag, Cache-Control).
Add tests for invalid JSON payloads and content-type mismatches to validate body handling.
Maintain and expand idempotency tests to cover repeated identical requests in edge conditions.
